name: Courtney Jones
text:
My kids and I stumbled into this store today on a quest to find secondhand furniture for my son’s bedroom.  When I opened the door and saw all of the gorgeous, high quality decor and gifts I immediately looked at my kids and said, “DON’T TOUCH ANYTHING!” The owner, Lulu, immediately welcomed us like family and took my three boys on a journey through her store. She and my oldest became fast friends as they bonded over all the crystals, gemstones, and fossils.
This store is such a unique place full of gorgeously, curated pieces at every price point. We will be going back ASAP because I’m kicking myself for not buying a piece of wall decor that I want and also because we want to hang out with Lulu again!

resp.text: Omg .. you and your family are amazing warm   hearted people ♥.  I enjoy hanging out.  You all are welcome anytime 😊.  Looking forward to seeing you guys soon.  God bless 🙏

name: opal armistead
text: Amazing inventory! Very eclectic mix that guarantees you won't walk out of the doors empty handed. If you're looking for that one of a kind conversation piece,  this is the place to be! Definitely recommend to my friends.

name: Scot Reeves
text: This place is truly amazing. Beautiful, interesting things curated from all over the world. Definitely worth a stop. The owner is an absolute delight. One of my favorite places.

name: Mona Davidson
text: Absolutely loved this little place! The owner was wonderful as well, so friendly, knowledgeable & helpful. I am in love with the 2 rings I bought and can't wait to go back.

name: Matt Moss
text: This place has something for everyone!  The shop owner is amazing and has an eye for everything BEAUTIFUL.  You wont be disappointed.  Stop in and say hello.

name: Brittany Sasser
text: I absolutely LOVE this store!! There is literally something for everyone. When you walk in, you feel better. It’s a truly magical place!!

name: wanda white
text: Great place to browse. Super friendly

name: Breanna Furline
text: The best jewelry and unique items! Also the owner is the sweetest!! Some of my most favorite jewelry pieces are from. Gypsy!

name: Krys Smith
text: This store has something for everyone! It has such a fun eclectic vibe and LuLu is such a beautiful person.

name: Tania Worthey
text: Owner reached out to ask what could be improved. Loved that. Had to edit my rating.

name: Britney Pierre
text: I love this shop! My favorite is the jewelry! The owner is the sweetest, a must visit!

name: Brenna Bonner
text: This is a Beautiful store full of treasures with wonderful customer service from Lulu! 👑

name: Lin Obeid
text: Good customer service, friendly prices and clean!

name: Brandy Robinson
text: Love this shop and the owner!!

name: Dayana Pickard
text: Will not be disappointed!!!!

name: Britney Pierre
text: I love this shop! My favorite is the jewelry! The owner is the sweetest, a must visit!

name: Brenna Bonner
text: This is a Beautiful store full of treasures with wonderful customer service from Lulu! 👑

name: Lin Obeid
text: Good customer service, friendly prices and clean!

name: Brandy Robinson
text: Love this shop and the owner!!

name: Dayana Pickard
text: Will not be disappointed!!!!

name: Courtney Grimes
text: For my daughters sweet 16 we spent a few days in Gulf Shores. The only thing she really wanted to make sure she got to do was go in this store. We spent maybe 2.5 hours searchig for our treasures and we just had an amazing experience.  When we walked in the store you could feel the energy. The owner was so kind. He recommended a few items to us . Selenite and black tourmaline. I really appreciated that he took his time to talk to us and educate us. I hope to visit again before the shop goes to online.

name: Kinsley Keeton
text: I went here while I was staying in the area on vacation and was looking for a tigers eye bracelet. I easily found just what I was looking for and even bought another crystal. It had almost every crystal I was interested in I will definitely be visiting again next time I'm in town!

resp.text: Thank you for the review and your support! Be sure to subscribe to our email for the new location announcement. Our last day in our current location will be Aug 29th. 🙏💜 we will also have a new online website launch in October. Thank you again and we hope you enjoy the rest of your time here in Coastal Alabama.

name: Stormy Rainbows
text: Amazing customer service- My twin two year old toddlers were acting 🤪🤪..The amazing gentlemen came over and let them pick some small black tourmaline for them to keep to help calm them! Then we had forgot our debit card and the nice woman at the desk wasn’t bothered at all in my son still acting a mess. Prices were FANTASTIC! They even have a small mining sluice. Will definitely be making this one of my go to crystal shops! Thank y’all so much for your patience and guidance.

name: Kennedy Grace
text: I loved it so much I was only in orange beach for a week and went to coastal zen 3 TIMES. I'm addicted. The staff was really friendly. and the prices are the best I've ever seen. And with them being online now too! they are the only place I'll ever get my spiritual needs.

name: Mariam Smith
text: My sister and I did a sand bucket panning, it was very amusing and we got a nice selection of rocks and shark teeth! Everything was really cute too, I ended up with some cool mushroom stickers myself ☺️

resp.text: Yeah! Thank you for the review, we appreciate you! So glad you two enjoyed the mining ⛏ have a wonderful weekend!

name: Allison Chapman
text: I will visit here every time we go to Gulf Shores or Orange beach!! I will have to shop in their online store until then! It was such a peaceful store. The owner was very courteous and helped us but he didn't hover over us like many shops will. We spent almost an hour shopping and everything was well worth its price! So glad we found this gem on our day trip I will be enjoying my goodies for a long time!

name: Shawn Mitchell
text: This was by far our favorite shop at The Wharf. We got lucky and were there when the owners were in the store. We were looking at the petrified wood and they ended up showing us so many more interesting pieces! They have this store because they love the stones and other items. Everything was reasonably priced and beautiful!

name: Sierota Beth Brackett
text: My experience at A Coastal Zen was fabulous! The owners are warm and welcoming. I felt very much at home as I browsed through their collection of healing crystals, ritual candles & incense, inspirational/motivational art, spiritual & meditation tools, and all sorts of unique trinkets and decorations. The store is filled with interesting products from across the world. There is something here for everyone! The owners even showed me a few of their prized personal possessions which were kept in the back room, making me feel like V.I.P.  The store itself was well kept...which I can only imagine to be a constant struggle considering how many shelves and items must be dusted frequently to maintain the clean environment. Everything sparkles! If you have the chance, ask the owner about the musical vibrations produced by the bronze gong hanging behind the register -- it makes beautiful sounds which fill the space entirely, engulfing it's visitors in a sense of peace and tranquility. This store is just the kind of retail attraction our community needs in this area - Definitely recommend visiting A Coastal Zen as soon as possible!!! Bring more money than you think you will need because you will be surprised how many items will strike your fancy! The owners are well educated in product knowledge and price the pieces very, very reasonably. It's a treasure trove of goodies!!!

resp.text: Thank you so very much for such a glowing review. We love our customers and so look forward to you visiting us again.

name: Ken
text: absolutely amazing the store keepers where very helpful and i got exactly what i needed 5 stares

name: Pansexual doom
text: I went to the warf on a vacation and stumbled apon this place, it is so cute and welcoming, the prices are super reasonable and the family that owns the place is so kind and helpful, if you are LGBTQ+ or wiccan/pagan/spiritual this place is a safe space and offers you things to show your pride or help your spiritual journey!!! I can't stress how much serotonin A Coastal Zen gives me!!!

resp.text: Awe… you made my night 💕🌈♥️ we appreciate the love and You!

name: Free Me
text:
My birthday just got better!

The kids and I came in for a little Crystal mining ⛏ and had a blast learning about different stones and their meanings. I definitely recommend Coastal Zen ! They have great prices and welcoming customer service 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩 don’t let no hater tell you different 👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽 That’s on period 🙃

name: Antoinette Hardy
text: I bought my custom made ring from here and I'm totally happy with it. Katherine helped me and she was very patient with me, as I am a very picky. She is very knowledgeable about diamond and will find you a diamond at a reasonable price.

resp.text:
Hi Antoinette

Thank you for a review but I think you may have us mistaken with another company. We do not sell diamond rings nor do we have anyone who works for us named Katherine.

We are a rock/crystal shop
In a orange Beach ❤️

Hope you have a great Holiday Season!

name: Michelle Murr
text: If you are looking for something and you're not sure what, this is THE PLACE FOR YOU!  Went with a friend in search of specific stones and spent a ridiculous amount of time in the store.  Amazing people and amazing products.  I left with bracelets for myself and friends, rocks for same, prayer candles and a great gift for a friend who is a healer.  A beautiful blessing awaits you, don't miss a chance to check this place out!!!!!!

name: Alexandra Co
text: Love this store! Nice ambiance, great selection and the staff is always so helpful, patient and knowledgeable.

name: Melodye Harleen
text: This place is a non-negotiable part of every trip up north for my brother and I. I generally love bookstores, especially intimate and down to earth bookstores with interesting selections. Loved this place even before I knew all the history it held.

name: kxlciii
text: best crystal shop <3

name: Don Cheek
text: Glad that we took the time to visit this store. Me and the wife found stones for us both. It was mind blowing how much information Stan gave us and in the decision that we made in our purchases. Will definitely return.

name: Suerianne Davis
text: The selection and quality in this store are amazing! The personal attention and the knowledge that Stan and his staff provide makes choosing the stones and jewelry and clusters really gratifying.  Moreover, Stan was willing to work with me to sell and mail an order when I could not travel to Alabama.  I look forward to returning when traveling is safe.  Such a wonderful experience to be at A Coastal Zen!

name: Lisa Hannah
text: I love this place!! I found it 3yrs ago on our annual trip to Gulf Shores from Missouri my trip is not complete without shopping here for my yearly supplies. They are so friendly and helpful!! Also they have descriptions and uses with each stone its so amazing!! Thank You!! Will see you again in March!!

name: Peyton Cole
text: Hey I told y’all I was coming back today but I didn’t keep my word I went on home but I really appreciate all the knowledge Stan blessed me and my family with. I also appreciate the sweet deal he gave me! Hopefully me and my family luck and energy will begin to turn around and be positive

resp.text: Thank you, Peyton!  So glad you enjoyed your visit with Stan and hope you come back to see us soon!

name: Kathy Humphres
text: Awesome place with so many cool things and very reasonable prices. I love to go there the owners are so friendly and helpful I could spend hours just checking everything out. If you’re ever in the area you should check them out.

resp.text: Thank you, Kathy!  So glad you enjoyed your visit and hope you come back soon!

name: Debbie Busby
text:
Very neat little shop! Beautiful crystals, stones salt lamps. Bracelets, earrings etc...
I was able to find all of my  souvenirs to take back home with me. While I was there they have this mining  thing for children to kinda of mine for their own shells or crystals‼️ Super Cute. Great Customer Service❤️

name: Glenda Zollicoffer-Harrel
text: I had such a wonderful experience there yesterday. The owner was so nice. I bought so many pieces, but not everything I wanted, she told they had an online store for using later. gave. She also have me some useful information on traveling back this way next time. I will definitely be shopping online with her.

resp.text: Thank you, Glenda!  We so appreciate you taking the time to write us such a glowing review!  Come back soon!

name: Tina Cozart
text: Beautiful store, friendly staff and great prices! 💯🥰✨

name: Susanna Forbes
text: Coastal Zen is wonderful, the staff is always very helpful, everything is crazy affordable and they have everything you need. Stan is very helpful and really knows what he's taking about. I always spend way more than I would want to there, but it's totally worth it ❤️

resp.text: Thank you, Susanna!  We have the best customers and love that you enjoy shopping with us as much as we appreciate you!

name: Brandy McGee
text: I’m a huge crystal hound and I was so excited to find this shop on my vacation here. The girl working was super sweet and very knowledgeable. I overheard her helping some ladies to pick out stones and she really knew her stuff. I found a lot a crystals that I didn’t have in my collection. Most expensive one was $3. I love this place!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Brandy!  We are so glad you found us and hope you make a repeat visit to our area soon!

name: PαԵԵí Aղժҽɾsօղ
text: Just from the reviews and photos of the shop I want to go visit! I'm a local and will certainly drop some dough on some crystals, tapestries, tarot?, and more😊 I CAN'T WAIT!! Thank you for opening a metaphysical shop in our area! ❤️

resp.text: Hi Patti 🙏 I finally figured out how to access these reviews and respond 😇 thank you so very much for the love and support❣️ let us know if we may assist you with any of your spiritual tool needs or if you just want a little pick me 😘 also send a text to the shop phone 251-752-3489 and let us know who you are and we will text you back a discount code to use in the shop or online 😍 Many blessings and much gratitude always 🙏💙😇 MK

name: Princess MeMe
text: We had a very welcoming experience. Staff/Owners were very friendly and helpful, not pushy, they were happy to help and answer questions. They made us feel like friends instead of customers. They had a great selection, I had a hard time choosing so I got a few items, We definitely recommend this awesome place. Thank you so much for all you've done for us. Be Blessed!

name: Denise Davies
text: Found this place during my yearly October orange beach visit with my husband. I wanted to find a real metaphysical shop, and this is a hidden little gem at the wharf. Whimsical, clean, and the staff was incredibly sweet. 10/10 will visit and give my business every time I visit.

resp.text: Hi Denise ❤️ thank you for your kind words and wonderful feedback! We truly appreciate all of our customers and we love hearing feedback! In a world full of rocks you are one of our favorite Gems 💎 😘✌️😍 many blessings to you and your loved ones always! MK

name: Sarah Wyckoff
text: This shop is wonderful, and there is nothing quite like it in our area! The selection is great, and the prices are very reasonable. The staff were so friendly and helpful. I will definitely make this a regular stop!

name: Brandy Knodel
text: My absolute favorite store ever. Love you all and thank you for walking with me down my crystal journey.

resp.text: Thank you, Brandy. We do enjoy our customers and love making their experience a fun one when they visit us. We hope you visit us often!

name: Cara Prentice
text: Loved this place! It was so nice to find a store that is so peaceful and inviting in a busy tourist area. Great selection of crystals, stones, jewlery & more. Owners are great and very knowledgeable. Make sure to ask them to show you what they know!

name: Lauralea Lasher
text: A wide variety of crystals and stones. Extremely reasonable pricing. Great selection on natural quartz crystals. As well as knowledgeable and friendly staff. I had to come back twice in a week for more!

resp.text: Thank you! We are so excited to be open and sharing our love of Crystals and things Love! We truly appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review! May you always be showered with Blessings!

name: Rachel Lavergne
text:
Absolutely love this place, I found a beautiful Mermaid light for a reasonable price and they were even nice enough to offer me a discount since I was from out of state. They have so much to offer, glad I stopped by!!!!

-Rachel

name: Lindsay Hoebing
text: What a wonderful establishment! There’s such a wide array of items available. The owner is very knowledgeable about everything in the store as well. I wish there were more stores like this!

name: patricia forrest
text: So grateful this shop is here now! Beautiful store with a great selection and incredible customer service. There's something for everyone here and the owners are extremely knowledgeable and so, so kind!! 💙🙏💚

name: dolly wallace
text: Outstanding customer service and were very knowledgeable about their inventory. Liked them so much I will buy from their online store until my next visit to Orange Beach.

name: Jeremy Thomas
text: Really cool stones, very nice!

name: T. Shane Smith
text: Hands down the best massage experience(s) of my life. Ian is friendly, intuitive, strong, and talented. It’s a great shop, and the crystal selection is fantastic. I’d dare say it’s the best place to purchase crystals in Birmingham. Evolve has a forever client, and I cannot recommend it enough!

name: Laquiana Sanders
text: Ian has the best hands in the world. Definitely the G.O.A.T.

name: Mylah Morris
text: Very cool store! Staff was friendly and helpful.

name: Neq H
text: This place is amazing! I got lost on my way there and they made me feel relaxed before I even entered the building. My masseuse was Jenna and she was amazing. She made me feel really comfortable before starting and she was really gentle with me, due to this being my first time. It surely will not be my last! Self care is some of the best care, call and make yourself an appointment!!

name: Coach Ky
text: I always feel innergized after leaving. Jenna and Ian are the best!

name: Jimmy Duncan
text: Jenna was so awesome, I was so impressed with her professionalism, and the time that she spent with me. And then additional time she spent with me to explain how I could prevent further problems.

name: Shana Curry
text: I love Evolve Masssage! Never disappointed when I leave. From the first appointment to now, I've always left relaxed. I've been with Brittany from day one and I  have monthly appointments.  Brittany makes sure that any issues/pains that you are dealing with are addressed during each session. I'm always satisfied when I leave.

name: Laura McFarland
text: I love coming here.  The rooms are warm and well decorated with soothing lights and colors.  Jenna is a wonderful massage therapist.  She has helped me so much with my pain and tension.  I feel amazingly relaxed after each session.  Definitely worth it.

name: LeAnn Wood
text: Ian is my massage therapist and truly looks for what is best for me. He does different massage techniques each time, to target the areas that cause me so much pain. He has worked miracles on my “tennis elbow” and is currently working to relieve the swelling in my legs. Being consistent is key. I go almost every 2 weeks right now.

name: Sunny Graydon
text: Evolves atmosphere, energy, services, products and providers are extraordinary!  Who knew a place like this existed in Birmingham!  Highly recommend a visit if you seek alternative healing in a high vibe, professional setting.

name: Allison Clough
text: Just had a massage with Michael. It was wonderful. He found my tight spots and worked magic. This was my second massage in my life so I was a little nervous going in. Michael put my uneasiness to rest and made it was very comfortable. We had an easy conversation too. Will definitely be back again.

name: jackee bishop
text: Friendly and comfortable

name: Keith Chichester
text: I recently had a 90 min massage with Jenna and she was incredible. This was my second experience at Evolve and both have been extremely professional, reasonably priced, and high-quality.

name: Emily Lord
text: I have arthritis and chronic pain. Ian provided great service, relief from pain almost immediately and no bad next day side effects. Very comfortable, welcoming atmosphere.

name: Tracy BrownBeauty
text: Received a pain therapy massage from Michael which was heavenly. So much I was compelled to schedule another session in two weeks. Thanks Alexis for the referral. It was soooo worth it. Awesome Awesome,  just Awesome❤❤

name: discoim
text: I love Evolve Massage!  The staff is extremely professional and they perform amazing massages.  I have been a client for over 3 years now

name: Heman McCray
text: By far the best massage experience I've ever had. I've never felt more safe, comfortable and at home. Ian does a great job in facilitating the healing process and helping me learn and grow as a person also. I don't ever plan on going anywhere else, I highly recommend Evlove!

resp.text: That really means so much to us! We put our hearts and souls into helping people grow and manage their pain efficiently, here at Evolve. Thank you!

name: K Evans-Vandergrift
text:
Evolve is a family own business. I love supporting small businesses.
I was first introduced to Evolve by Mike's sister. I had a 90 min and 60 min deep tissue massage with Mike. I enjoyed it, it was very relaxing. I now have me time once a month.
Just so you know, they have 2 locations. I have had the pleasure of visiting both locations. If you are in Homewood or Southside go by and see Mike, Val and their staff at Evolve Massage & Alternative Healing. They are wonderful!!!😊

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review Kim! See you in a few weeks! 😁

name: Natalie Martina
text:
Reiki therapy with Ian is excellent.
If you haven’t tried it or you have I highly recommend!!!!

name: John Shacka
text: Professional, relaxing environment. Best massage in Birmingham!

name: Kristi Griffin
text: Super experienced and friendly staff

name: Deborah Griffin
text: Great!!!

name: Johanna Bender
text: Awesome place to a full body massage. This placed really very professional, nice and relaxing to relieve stress.

resp.text: We are so happy that you enjoyed your visit! See you in a couple weeks!

name: Evey Wilkins
text: I absolutely LOVE this store and the employees there! They gave the most beautiful necklaces and all your incense needs, go check them out for all your spiritual healing needs 😍😍

name: Cotie Foshee
text: Love this store. Has everything you could every want or need. Candles, soaps, gemstones. Etc. Good prices also. Wonderful people

resp.text: Thank you so much for being apart of the family

name: Victoria Christopher
text:
💛💛💛 Good vibes all around 💛💛💛
amazing people and products

resp.text: We are so happy you found the shop a smile maker. bug hug

name: Brandy Anderson
text: Absolute lovely store with a variety of merchandise and excellent prices.

resp.text: Thank you so much we try so hard to please

name: Carrie E
text: Was given a free sample of a topical CBD oil ointment to use for pain relief. The ointment caused a blistering chemical burn that caused the skin to peel off. I contacted the store to let them know that their ointment caused a chemical burn and I was told that it couldn't have possibly been caused by their product and that it was an allergic reaction. All I wanted was to let them know that their product caused harm so that they could test their sample before giving it out to anyone else. Instead of an apology or even saying they would check it out all I got was accusations that it couldn't possibly have been from their ointment. I should have known better because it was probably never tested or FDA approved but some homemade remedy they are just selling out of the shop. BUYER BEWARE! Don't buy from this store. Buy from only reputable sources!

resp.text: And we did tell you to quit using it because you definitely had an allergy to it. Sweet Jesus I've got to get a one-star review because you're allergic to something that we sell. It just doesn't seem right we were really nice to you even though you were allergic to something we made.

name: Dusty Smith
text: Have too promote the shop for it'ss wwwwholessome selection will be iinSoon

resp.text: Thank you!!!

name: Christopher Winston
text: I love the cornerstone market you will always find something you need in there. The owner is vary nice and will help you if you need help finding a product you need.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Sky High
text: I’m in incense heaven - owner lady was super friendly and very helpful. I will be back every time I need incense.

resp.text: Awesome!!!

name: Khrystal Washington
text: The staff and doctors are very welcoming, pleasant and professional. My dog has no fear of them at all. The doctors are very thorough in explaining resolutions to any issues your fur baby may be having. We've been going here since my pup was 8 weeks old, almost a year now. Appointments are also accommodating on short notice.

name: Joshua Davis
text: Great place to get coffee and sit for a spell.

name: Ghost Tracker Jenny
text: It was actually Books Beans and Candles that I visited. But I think Rune is their psychic reading area. Right now, the readings and upstairs area is closed until the viral crisis ends. But the rest of the store is open. Love going here. I don't get to go as often as I would like due to distance from home. But with my quarterly visits, they never disappoint. Very friendly staff and can answer almost any question you may have.

name: rb S
text: Great reads!

name: Pat Kelly
text: See for yourself

name: Frank Watkins
text: Great

name: Brian Terry
text: As a vinyl collector, I don’t normally like to share my “honey-holes”, but Urban Atlas has one of the best selections of used vinyl records that I’ve seen anywhere . Prices are very reasonable and everything I’ve bought or looked at was graded accurately. There’s also a large selection of clothing, candles , teas and other cool things. They offer yoga and meditation classes as well .

resp.text: Thanks for the review!

name: Mark Mitchell
text: Stopped in today first time,  great place and vibe, a real gem! Awesome vinyl section, picked up a few for the collection!

name: Callie White
text: Cute store but I’ll never shop here again. I was given a gift card for Christmas, which was purchased mid-December, and didn’t realize it had an expiration date. This wouldn’t have been a problem, except the expiration date was April 1st, a mere four months after it was purchased. The problem isn’t the expiration date itself, it’s the fact that it’s not even six months out + we’re in the middle of a global pandemic. It’s not the easiest to get out and use gift cards at the moment. According to the store owner, the money “can’t be held that long” as it’s “unfair to others who sell in the store,” despite the fact that the gift card was paid for, in cash, and should be treated as if it’s cash. This is bad business practice and has turned me off as a customer.

name: Adalanta Grimes
text: I visit every time I’m in Decatur and always find great birthday/Christmas gifts for my whole family plus tons of things that fit my own style!! Would definitely recommend checking it out next time you’re in Decatur!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!! ❤️

name: Rebeca Williams
text: Urban atlas is my favorite place in Decatur! I visit here at least once a week, and I always leave with at least 1 thing! They have the coolest records, crystals, art, plants, and so much more! A must see place if you’re in Decatur!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review!!

name: Sara Hurley
text: Great place to find the best unique gifts! The owner is extremely helpful and nice. Highly recommended that you check this place out!!!

name: Caleigh Duncan
text: I LOVE Urban Atlas!! There’s always such a great collection of records, clothing, and jewelry!! The atmosphere is always welcoming and enjoyable too. Definitely suggest stopping by to have a look around even if you don’t have anything specific in mind you’re looking for!

name: Amanda Richards
text:
I love this store so much! They have the best incense. The scents burn cleanly, with none of that funky, smoky "incense" smell (If you've ever burned the cheap stuff, you know what I'm talking about.). Smells Like Teen Spirit is my fave! It reminds me of my grandfather's cigars- warm vanilla and cherry.

The teas are good, too! Try the vanilla caramel rooibos herbal. So good, and it has a natural sweet taste.

The employees are also always super friendly and welcoming. This is far and away my favorite hippie shop. 😍

name: Rachelle Harden
text: Absolutally love this place! I've been coming here for 3 years and the vibe is amazing and they have high quality products that are local and amazing staff who remember you. Recommend this place to anyone looking for a unique gift!

name: Jennifer Housley
text: Got a beatiful green wand, loved it, store is so unique, you can get stuff here you can't get other places for sure. Sure even does meditation classes

name: Greg Wolodkewitsch
text: Unique and wonderfully blended, with a smooth vibe and wonderful people. Don't miss out on a one of a kind store.

name: Jerry Cobbs
text: Love this place! They had a free meditation day and we went to three sessions. Such a cool, laid back vibe.

resp.text: Thanks Jerry! It was great to have you!

name: Miss Nikki Shortkonner
text: The girls are good to me and my son

name: Dede Quarry
text: No longer Urban Atlas...they have moved down the street.  It's a new home goods/decor shop called Miss Muldrews

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Byron Cloer
text: Great place.. Great environment.. Great prices

name: Tyler Jackson
text: Amazing store and great staff!!

name: Sherri House
text: Super unique with great staff

name: Tammara Buckey
text: Great array of clothing, accessories, music and more!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Will
text: Love it 💕

name: Joy Gilbert
text:
My favorite metaphysical shop in Birmingham 💕
The owner is amazing, and always has such unique, beautiful items in stock. She is super knowledgeable in respect to her clientele, and can always help you to find something that speaks to you. Additionally, any shop that emphasizes the importance of female empowerment has my heart!!
Regardless of if you’re a beginner or seasoned in the practice, or simply curious, there is something for all. NO other ms in town is as welcoming, beautiful, or as eclectic as this one, do yourself a favorite and check it out!

resp.text: Thank you so much for such a beautiful review!  We always love to have you in the shop and can’t wait for your next visit!🖤

name: Nanna Moates
text: A very pleasant place.  Light and airy side by side with shadows.  A fun store to shop when you are looking for something a bit different.  Very nice employees with patience for those who would like to ask about the products.  Fantastic framed butterflies and moths.

name: Alli Parker
text: everyone here is super sweet friendly and talkative!! absolutely love it here! will come back😊!

resp.text: Yay!  We can’t wait to see you again soon!

name: Pure Bliss
text: I would have given a 4 or 5 but I was disappointed with my tarot reading. She was pulling cards randomly and kept saying that she "thinks" this means this or thinks this means that. I wasted $20. It was her lack of confidence in the reading that made me lose confidence in it. But overall, the staff is helpful and the prices are fair.

name: Lori Bond
text: I love this store. The owner is so friendly and knowledgeable. Best metaphysical store in central alabama.

name: Dalton Loconto
text: The staff is so wholesome and the prices are reasonable. They continuously get new and interesting items that keep me coming back

name: Linda Le
text: Wonderful little store! The women are so kind and helpful. You feel very welcomed

resp.text: So glad you like our little shop!!!!  Thank you for the kind words!

name: Joycelyn Webb
text: The people there were very nice, but the products were overpriced and after getting my crystals checked most were lab made and dyed to look more vibrant than they really are.

name: Nicole Jacobson
text: Love this place, beautiful items, lots of art, crystals, tarot cards.

name: Jenn King
text: Nice, friendly welcoming atmosphere!! Love everything inside and out about this store!! 👍🏾

name: caity buford
text: Absolutely beautiful store that is super welcoming. The owner was super nice and helpful as well 😊

name: Facebook
text: Quickly becoming one of my favorite stores to visit!

resp.text: 😘 Come visit anytime!  Love having you in the shoppe!

name: Lito Delmo
text: Tarot readings 👍

name: Yalanda Mobley
text: BEAUTIFUL place and people

name: Rosalie Harrison
text: This shop has actually everything I need when I can’t get something in need right away.  I’m actually surprised of some reviews on here. I had a great experience when visiting and the prices are exceptionally good. Crystals are expensive anyways so if you are getting them cheaper than what they originally sale for than they are probably not real, especially rare crystals. I would definitely recommend this shop to anyone looking for great quality products but if you are looking for something cheap then you definitely need to research other options! Everything in this shop are actually underpriced from what I know. Thanks for a great experience! I will be a regular customer!

name: Kaitlyn King
text: The staff here were so helpful and ready to share their knowledge. I just stocked up on incense during this visit but I know I could have asked them to enlighten me and they would have been happy to do so.

name: Kim Deal
text: Calm atmosphere, very friendly and knowledgeable of all items. Super helpful.

name: Hannah Mcle
text: Very nice products but overpriced. Customer service wasn’t very positive. But they got nice stuff tho I prolly won’t give my business further.

resp.text:
We deeply regret you feel this way. Our crystals are all ethically acquired and purchased directly from the mines that do not utilize slave and child labor.
There is no Reiki class per se. There is a Reiki introduction workshop to inform in depth of the history of Reiki. The actual Reiki teaching is done on an individual one on one basis, and currently we have 3 students who come in weekly for their separate studies.
We earnestly hope you find what you need.
Be Blessed.

name: Cody Flynt
text: Cool stuff. Prices are up there but if its your thing you cant find this stuff anywhere else that im aware of

name: Tyler Smith
text: very nice and helpful for people who are new to this kind of thing :,) they have great prices and a very good selection of candles, incense, crystals etc.. the employes are very nice and patient :p

name: Bob Crawford
text: Spacious store, with a varied selection of crystals, incense, books, and much more. Super friendly staff made our visit a pleasure.

name: K Lindsey
text: Tons to choose from...staff extremely welcoming, nice and helpful...

name: Charles Pillard
text: A friend told us about this place yesterday so we went and checked it out . Love the store and the staff is amazingly friendly . Bought a few thing . Love the incense sticks . Thank you guys for making our day . I guess my only issue here is google has it labeled as a pharmacy. If not for that we would have came here years ago

name: Dakota S
text: Nice workers, great products. They moved a lot of their tobacco supplies to Da Gallery/Dreamscapes up the road jsyk. Most of the product now is metaphysical stuff like crystals and incense.
